title: 105: The Republic, Book III
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This is the continuation of the series on Plato's Republic. Book III is where Plato goes a little off the rails. Got a terminal disease? Might as well kick the bucket.
itunes:author: Plato, Socrates, and Some Third Guy
itunes:subtitle: Because apparently two weren't enough.
